Literature.Title: Identification of Holrhizins E-Q Reveals the Diversity of Nonribosomal Lipopeptides in Paraburkholderia rhizoxinica
Literature.Author: Chen H, Zhou H, Sun T, Xu J, Tu Q, Yang J, Zhang Y, Bian X

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human lung epithelial normal cells 2B:IC50=>40 µM
